phrases: Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Our house is all fixed now!
So this is the full power of a goddess, huh?
You actually restored our house and the whole city in an instant!
Well, I did because everyone a lot of trouble...
Now that the Lord of Terror is no longer a threat...
I guess Urd's playing tag with Skuld again.
So this is the first thing she does the minute her license is reinstated...
I have got you cornered, now!
I have got you cornered, now!
But why did she turn into a child?
To live in this world, we goddesses must draw on an energy supply...
The system crashed during the Lord of Terror incident, so...
In Urd's case, I think that is how the energy deficiency manifested itself.
So if she keeps on using her powers, she is only going to get smaller?
Oh no, we goddesses have alternate energy sources for emergencies.
Let me guess...could it be sake?
In Big Sister's case, it is sleep.
She did use her full power just now to fix the whole town.
Come to think of it, you seem fine, Skuld.
Sure, because she has no powers to speak of!
The grownups are talking right now, kid!
But listen, Urd, I will play with you later!
You have really got some nerve!
Is that a good idea, using your powers?
Hey, why do not we do something about your clothes?
But what kind of clothes should we buy?
I know, we can get her something at the neighborhood thrift shop!
To conserve energy, I have split off from myself.
Anyway, let us go get some clothes for Urd!
Hey, I think it rather becomes me!
You mean she actually likes it?
Uh...my cram school class has been canceled today.
It is not as if I always hang out here... it is just a coincidence...
Oh, no, it is not sake, it is a video game...
Look, you have got it all wrong.
I told you, I am not a child!
What in the world are your parents thinking?
Well, they do like to take the hands-off approach...
Come with me to the station!
Man, what a pain in the butt.
Is she a friend of yours?
Is she a friend of yours?
I just used up all my strength.
He was nice enough to bring it to me!
Nothing like a drink after a hard day's work!
But really, you are a little pushover, huh?
Running away with me like that!
Hey, but, is not that why you were able to get away?
By the way, what were you doing just now?
It is not like I was ditching cram school.
There is no class today, so...
I am talking about the game.
I am talking about the game.
That is the one that just came out, right?
This is Button A, and this is Button B.
And this is the Start button, and here is Reset.
Want to give it a try?
Want to give it a try?
I am a System Administrator goddess.
You do not have any more?
I had a pretty good time!
No way...how could you beat them all?
Anyway, I think I will head home now.
Will you be here tomorrow, too?
I am really going to be late for cram school, now...
Urd, we heard from the Almighty after you left the house.
He told us that we should use moon rocks as an alternate...
Hold on...how are we going to get our hands on moon rocks?
We are heading out to make some.
The facilities we need are at school.
So we are going to gather up the materials.
Urd, you only have to hold on a little longer!
Well, there is no rush, really.
Being a kid is more fun than I thought.
She seems to be enjoying herself.
She seems to be enjoying herself.
So what are we going to do today?
Today I have got some games that are way more difficult than yesterday's...
Moon rocks are mainly composed of a type of volcanic rock called basalt.
So all we need is to get some basalt?
Actually, Moon rocks have a slightly different composition than Earth rocks.
That is why we have to make them ourselves.
But once we do that, you two can go back to normal right away.
Going to all this trouble for us...
I mean, this is the one thing I can do for you...
But even I am not that out of breath!
You see...um...you cannot drink sake until you are an adult...
And I am still in grammar school...
And even if it is a vending machine, I still should not do it...
I do not think I can...um...
Falling down is not my thing, see...
And do not look up, got that?
Most people would say'Do not look down!'
Rats, what did I tell you?
That is exactly why I told you not to look up!
Thanks to you, I just got even smaller!
Oh, nothing, just talking to myself!
I am sorry I did not buy your sake for you just now.
It is time for cram school, so I will be going now.
But it is still light out.
I have got early classes today.
If you think you cannot do something, you will never be able to do it...
Uh, um, what are you going to do?
We are going to climb it, what did you think?
All you have to do now is cross over here.
No way can I do that!
If I fall, I will be killed!
Did not I just tell you?
If you think you cannot do something, you will never be able to do it...
But, saying that is one thing... if I really do fall...
My sake...you brought it to me, remember?
Come to think of it, at that time...
Why was I able to do something like that then?
I have got to go after her.
I mean, from up there, this was the tallest building I could find...
I think I might have gotten too involved...
Should not you be heading for your cram school?
Okay, I will see you around!
You are a foreigner, are not you?
How long are you going to be in Japan?
I told you when we met, remember?
That I am not a child...
You can turn back to your old self now.
Oh, boy, so he did follow me home.
Urd, do not tell me that you and that boy...
I thought I was just passing the time...
Maybe it is best that I turn back now, after all...
Wait...are you a friend of my little sister's, maybe?
If you came to see Urd, she is not here anymore.
She went back to her own home, you see.
And she probably will not be coming back here.
That is not why I am here.
That is not why I am here.
Could you please give this back to Urd for me?
Also, tell Urd that I said thank you...
That I am going to stop giving up before I even try...
That I know I can hang in there...
And so, when I am all grown up...
So grow up fast, all right?
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
